channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-10018] Activating SQLStandardAuth results in NPE [hbase-metastore branch]
item.description: Setting the config to run SQLStandardAuth and then doing even simple SQL statements results in an NPE.
item.summary: Activating SQLStandardAuth results in NPE [hbase-metastore branch]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Fixes a few failures to check for null and one place where I tried to use equals on two different enum classes.

Overall: -1 no tests executed
